an5.16:1.3: The powers of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
an5.16:1.5: Of these five powers, the power of wisdom is the chief. It holds and binds everything together.
an5.16:1.6: It’s like a bungalow. The roof-peak is the chief point, which holds and binds everything together.
an5.16:1.7: In the same way, of these five powers, the power of wisdom is the chief. It holds and binds everything together.”
